messages.content: Britain can't afford five more years of Gordon Brown and his failed policies. At this election, Britain needs real change. A change to get our economy moving. A change to clean up Westminster sleaze. A change to cut the taxes of ordinary families. That's what the Liberal Democrats are offering this time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain, only the Liberal Democrats can defeat Gordon Brown and Labour. Only a vote in the ballot box for the Liberal Democrats can beat Labour this time.

issues.economy: At this election, Britain needs real change. A change to get our economy moving.
issues.governance: A change to clean up Westminster sleaze.

images.caption: In many parts of Britain, it's a two horse race between the Liberal Democrats and Labour

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Don't forget, your vote could decide between five more years of Gordon Brown OR real change with the Liberal Democrats.
